This Research Documentation means to provide both a comprehensive source of information about the underlying project as well as facilitate its cooperative approach. Following the general ideas of [Open Science](https://www.fosteropenscience.eu/learning/what-is-open-science/#/id/5ab8ea32dd1827131b90e3ac), we thus hope to achieve a high degree of transparency and reproducibility in our conduct of research.

**Important disclaimer:** The content of this Website is not a substitute for a signed Study Protocol. When in doubt, the content of the most recently signed Study Protocol overrules the content of this Documentation.

The design of this Documentation follows the guides on [Good Epidemiological Practice (GEP)](https://www.dgepi.de/assets/Good-Epidemiological-Practice-GEP-EurJ-Epidemiol-2019.pdf)[@hoffmann2019] and [Gute Praxis Sekundärdatenanalyse (GPS)](https://www.dgepi.de/assets/Leitlinien-und-Empfehlungen/GPS_revision2-final_august2014.pdf)[@swart2015].
